body.name: LED Floor Lamp, 2400LM Super Bright Standing Lamp 250W Equivalent with 2700K-6500K Stepless Dimming, Modern Torchiere Sky Lamp with Remote & Touch Control, 69" Tall Lamp for Living Room Bedroom Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 50 mins
features: 🌕 Adjustable Brightness & Color Temperature & Rotatable Head: Yikuneng LED floor lamp adopts stepless dimming and color temperatures 2700K-6500K. When your kids doing homework, 100% brightness and 5000K daylight are appropriate for reading the books and note. And the dimmable floor lamp can light up any area with 350°rotatable head.

🌖 Comfortable Night Light Mode & Memory Function : The LED floor lamp for bedroom night model design with soft warm white, you may feel relaxed and comfortable, when you see the warm light in the darkness, create a great sleep environment for your families. The floor lamp can remember your last settings even when you turn it off or after power cut.

🌗 Convenient Remote Control & Touch Control: With advanced RF remote control, easy to control your floor lamps any where any direction (with a 50ft range), even you are in another room. The remote has magnets design, you can put it on the standing lamps which find it easily. You also can control it by touch.

🔴 Modern Design & Stable Base: Our modern floor lamp has a sleek and modern design that complement to your home decor, maximize your space with modern lifestyle. Yikuneng tall floor lamp(69inch) with weighted base firmly hold the standing light to prevent the toppling over when the kids or the pets pass it.

💡 Super Bright & Save Energy: Use 132pcs advanced LEDs, equal to 250W incandescent torchiere floor lamps. Our bright floor lamp 24W more bright then other 30W LED floor lamp, it means save more energy for you, directly reflected on your electricity bill. Works perfectly for living room, bedroom, studying room, office, etc

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rotatable Head With 350° right-left rotation, 180° up and down adjustable, making the LED floor lamp free to set the angle to illuminate different areas. With compact size, slim design, making the living room lamp fitting with the most compact space. Lightweight and easy to move, versatile with a variety of scenes. Remote with Magnets Design 1. You can put the remote control on the standing lamps which find it easily. You also can control it by touch. 2. Remote is pre-paired before delivery. 3. Requires 2 AAA batteries (not include) Stable Lamp Base The weighted base and sturdy design allow the living room floor lamp to swing freely and be safe around children and pets. It can stand up to a 15-degree tilt and will not tip over easily even when hit by a child or pet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice corner lamp with plenty of options
reviews.reviewText: At first, the lamp seemed gimmicky. It turns out, it has some nice features.The lamp operates from a remote control that magnetically attaches to the pole. It seemed weird initially, but it’s really convenient. It’s very easy to grab, use and then put away.The lamp can be adjusted from dim to very bright. The color temperature adjusts from warm to cool.When it’s overcast outside, it’s nice to add a little sunniness with this lamp.The reading lamp works great, but I prefer the ceiling light for reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek, powerful lamp
reviews.reviewText: I'm using this lamp in my under-lit, dark wood panelled bedroom. Even with the overhead light on, it was too dark at night to tell navy and black clothes apart. After years of feeling like my bedroom is a cave, I bought this lamp. I am so pleased with it! It provides so much light, and the remote is a nice little bonus. I love the touch activated buttons, and the variety of tone and brightness. Only been using it a few weeks, but it has really madey room a more habitable place! Definitely recommend - it seems very sturdy. Plus no light bulbs to change!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stopped Working After 8 Months (UPDATED!)
reviews.reviewText: When I first got this lamp in April 2023, I loved it. All the different color temperature settings and brightness settings were great. The remote was very cheap and sometimes didn't respond, but that was a minor inconvenience.Yesterday when I went to turn the light on, it just quickly flashed on and off. I tried using the button on the front of the lamp and it did the same thing. After playing with it for a while, it started flashing on and off and then stayed on...for a while. I can't adjust the brightness or color temp any longer and the lamp sometimes won't turn on at all. I expected a simple LED lamp to last longer than 8 months for $32.UPDATE: The company contacted me and offered me a full refund for the lamp! That's the way to handle consumer complaints. I'm going to buy another and hope it works out. Rating was changed to 4-stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and light is bright
reviews.reviewText: The LED with different shades/intensity works well and the remote is convenient. It took me a few minutes to get the remote to work but the instructions were clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaces Old 300W Torch Lamp
reviews.reviewText: First, I am not affiliated with the owners or sellers in any way. But I've got to tell you about this lamp. I just got this lamp to replace my burned out 300W torch lamp. This one does it. It is a winner!But be sure to select the 42W option before ordering. The other 3 boxes below the description are lower wattage.It does everything they say it will do. I love it! It took no more than 15 minutes, if that, to assemble starting at the top as instructed. The remote works great and easily. It actually can stick to the pole by magnet, if you want. If the remote ever fails, you can control the lamp from the buttons on the pole. The pole is strong, not weak like some others. It is LED so no bulbs are needed.I set the main light at the brightest and whitest setting. It remembers that when I turn it back on. The reading light is on an adjustable goose neck. It turns on and off with a separate button on the remote and dims, changes whiteness, etc. separately as well. The reading lamp even has a setting for "reading". The big lamp has a setting for "nighttime" so you can dim it to a soft orangish glow when watching TV at night. The top large light swivels and tilts all over the place, not just 30 degrees or whatever. A great buy at this price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp. Would buy it again!!
reviews.reviewText: this is a great lamp. really lights up the room and easy to use with many features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the design of the light - it feels solid and looks clean. It's also fairly bright.It would be nice if it could also swivel down for reading (there would have to be a joint in the pole).My main complaint is the controls- to change the color, you have to cycle through every color and pattern in order. Even on the remote. I've bought tons of LEDs over the years and many have a remote with buttons for each of the main colors. This just has a single color button that you keep pressing.-- seller resolved my issue with the remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The secret to the patience-testing remote control
reviews.reviewText: This is a great low-priced floor lamp, and since it is LED it can potentially last for 20 years before the light goes out. The fact that it comes with a remote that not only powers it on and off but also features adjustment of the brightness level, color temperature, as well as offering a night light feature was as enthralling as it could get with a lamp when I first got it. It beats old-style incandescent or halogen lamp by MILES.And then the problem with the remote started. Whatever I needed it to do began to take TWO presses to accomplish. And then three. And then four. After a while I lost count and I came THIS close to throwing the darn remote against the wall.And then I started testing various OTHER angles of pointing the remote, other than the obvious choice of pointing it AT the lamp. After a while I began to realize pointing it AWAY from the lamp seems to work better. Umm...what the heck?!!!AND THEN I figured it out. You have to hold the remote upside down. As in holding it with all the feature buttons in your palm, and the blank part pointing at the lamp (please refer to my photo). And now every button works as it should with just one press!!!! The brilliant Chinese manufacturing had the remote signal going out from the BOTTOM of the remote, NOT the top! Who knew!Before this I was looking into giving up on the remote altogether and getting one of those WIFI remote control devices and using my phone as a remote. I don't need to do that at all now.Counter-intuitive is intuitive when it comes to some Made in China products. Lesson learned.
